abstract: Yahoo News, which has more unique visitors than any other news Web site, is partnering with ABC News to share stories and feature Web video series.
snippet: Yahoo News, which has more unique visitors than any other news Web site, is partnering with ABC News to share stories and feature Web video series.

headline.main: ABC News and Yahoo News Announce Deal to Share Content
headline.print_headline: Yahoo and ABC News Team Up for Online Reports, Adding a Touch of Star Power
